proposal.fictionalClientDescription: Okanagan Interior Design Studio is a boutique firm based in Kelowna, specializing in residential and light commercial interior design projects. Their team is known for a refined, contemporary approach and a growing reputation for transforming local homes and spaces.
proposal.coverHeadline: Elevate Your Interior Design Brand Online
proposal.coverSubheadline: A Custom Web & SEO Solution for Okanagan Interior Design Studio
proposal.clientOverview:
Okanagan Interior Design Studio has established a strong reputation in Kelowna for creating beautiful, functional living spaces. With a growing portfolio of both residential and boutique commercial projects, your studio is ready to expand its digital footprint and attract more high-value clients. We understand that you’re seeking a web presence that reflects your design expertise and helps you stand out in a competitive local market.

Your current website, while functional, no longer aligns with your brand’s sophistication or your clients’ expectations. You’ve expressed a desire for a website that not only showcases your portfolio but also drives qualified leads and demonstrates your authority within Kelowna’s design community. You are also looking to improve your local search visibility, ensuring that when Kelowna homeowners or business owners search for design expertise, your studio is top of mind.
proposal.problemAnalysis:
The interior design sector in Kelowna is highly competitive, with new firms and independent designers entering the market every year. Okanagan Interior Design Studio’s current website is visually outdated and difficult to update, limiting your ability to showcase new projects and testimonials. Additionally, your site ranks inconsistently for key local search terms, causing missed opportunities for organic discovery by new clients.

You’ve also noticed that potential clients are increasingly coming from online searches and social media, but your studio is not currently leveraging these channels to their full potential. Without a cohesive digital strategy, you risk losing visibility to competitors who are investing in robust web design, SEO, and ongoing digital marketing. Finally, the absence of clear tracking and reporting makes it difficult to measure the impact of your online efforts and refine your approach over time.
proposal.opportunitySection:
There is a significant opportunity for Okanagan Interior Design Studio to position itself as Kelowna’s go-to design authority with an elevated, conversion-driven website and a targeted local SEO strategy. By investing in a custom site that beautifully presents your portfolio, client testimonials, and unique process, you’ll create a first impression that converts more browsers into leads. Strategic on-page SEO and local directory optimization will help you rise above the competition in relevant Kelowna searches.

Our approach combines design excellence with proven digital marketing strategies, ensuring your studio attracts the right clients and makes the most of every online interaction. With proactive reporting and ongoing support, you’ll have the clarity and confidence to make data-driven decisions and continue growing your business well into the future.

recommendedServices.name: Custom Web Design & Development
recommendedServices.description: We’ll create a bespoke website that reflects your brand’s style and expertise, making it easy for clients to explore your portfolio and get in touch. Your new site will be mobile-friendly, fast, and fully optimized for user experience.

recommendedServices.name: Local SEO & Google Business Profile Management
recommendedServices.description: Boost your studio’s visibility in Kelowna searches and map results with targeted local SEO. We’ll optimize your Google Business Profile, citations, and local keywords to drive more qualified leads.

recommendedServices.name: Lead Generation & Reporting
recommendedServices.description: Convert more visitors into inquiries with streamlined lead capture and clear performance dashboards. We’ll set up tracking to monitor results and provide transparent, actionable insights.

implementationPhases.description: We’ll kick off with a collaborative workshop to understand your vision, goals, and brand identity. This phase includes competitor research, technical audits, and a detailed project roadmap.
Our team will design custom website mockups and collaborate with you to refine visuals and messaging. We’ll also support you in organizing project photos, testimonials, and service descriptions.
We’ll build your website, optimize it for speed and search engines, and implement all tracking tools. After your review, we’ll launch the site and initiate local SEO enhancements.
Post-launch, we’ll monitor performance, manage your Google Business Profile, and provide monthly reports. Our team is on hand for updates, troubleshooting, and ongoing growth initiatives.

proposal.timelineTotal: 8-10 weeks to launch, with ongoing support thereafter

pricingTiers.description: Ideal for studios seeking a beautiful, functional site and basic SEO essentials.
Our most popular package: full-featured website, robust SEO, lead gen, and reporting.
features: Full local SEO & Google Business Profile management

pricingTiers.description: For ambitious studios: advanced marketing integrations and long-term optimization.

caseExamples.title: Kelowna Veterinary Hospital Website Revamp
caseExamples.context: We redesigned their website and implemented a local SEO strategy to help them stand out among local veterinary clinics.
caseExamples.result: Website traffic increased by 72% in six months, with a 40% rise in local appointment inquiries.

caseExamples.title: Lakeshore Spa Digital Refresh
caseExamples.context: A boutique spa needed a modern website and improved Google visibility to drive more bookings.
caseExamples.result: Achieved top 3 local search rankings and doubled monthly booking requests within four months.

proposal.ctaHeadline: Ready to Transform Your Digital Presence?
proposal.ctaBody: Let’s collaborate to make Okanagan Interior Design Studio the first choice for discerning Kelowna clients. We’re excited to help you grow with a website and SEO strategy as sophisticated as your designs.

enriched.positioning: Thriveline positions itself as a trusted, local digital partner providing tailored web design and SEO solutions for Kelowna businesses seeking professional, hands-off online growth.
valuePropositions: Personal, responsive service with direct access to a small, skilled team
Custom solutions tailored to each client's business goals
Transparent, jargon-free communication and honest pricing
Proactive, professional website care with full client ownership and control
Results-focused strategies that adapt to changing digital trends, including AI search
differentiators: Locally based, woman-owned agency with deep roots in Kelowna
Direct, personal service from a small, expert team—no passing clients around
Full transparency and client ownership of all digital assets
Custom, never-template solutions tailored to each business
Proactive, ongoing support and clear, human-friendly reporting
